Agent.100101.3:
"The main street is piled high with junk—not only is it hurting business at The Market, but it's a crash waiting to happen!

If only we could get a Trekker to come help clean it up..."
Agent.100102.3: Recently, biker gang activity in Silver District has been on the rise, with noise disturbances severely affecting the residents' daily lives. We are now recruiting Trekker squads to help put a stop to it.
Agent.100103.3: Offering a huge reward for any Trekker who can locate a missing pet belonging to a distinguished resident. Generous compensation guaranteed upon completion.
Agent.100201.3:
Trekker Acrobats Tour now recruiting front-row professional spectators.

Payment? This is a rare learning opportunity! Do it for the experience!
Agent.100202.3:
"There are some monsters wandering near the city walls—might as well take care of them while we're here!"

"As for re-reward... Ahem, helping the people out is priceless! ...Just, uh...just stick close behind me and learn some proper combat skills, alright?"
Agent.100203.3:
"There are books everywhere... Somehow they've piled up into hills, haha..."

"If you help me sort them, I can give you a few in return... I have already read them all anyway!"
Agent.100301.3:
"In my hands, these unwanted Blank Discs can become a beautiful piece of installation art."

"That's right, once the exhibition's over, these Discs are all yours!"
Agent.100302.3:
A collector has put up well-preserved records as a reward, issuing a bounty:

"A cat slipped in through the window and ran off with my treasured Disc!"

"It's been passed down to me from my great-great-grandfather—I must recover it!"
Agent.100303.3:
A composition challenge issued by a mysterious music master—

All to find you, the one with the perfect pitch.

The prize: a rare, exquisite, and beautiful glazed record.
Agent.200101.3:
Oh no! My teammate just rushed into the dance studio and started fighting the Grotesque Dancer!

I can't stop them by myself. Someone, please help!
Agent.200102.3: Ah! How can there be such a beautiful top hat! It belongs inside my display case! I must have it!
Agent.200103.3: A dance machine is basically a rhythm game. The key to beating it isn't dancing skills but memorizing the patterns. I'll put together a team to record every single pattern.
Agent.200201.3:
How can I get buff?

If only someone could give me some tips.
Agent.200202.3:
I've heard that the Count's Reserve is a rare vintage. Its color is as clear as a gemstone, its texture as smooth as silk...

If I ever get the chance, I'd love to try it for myself...
Agent.200203.3:
Cursipots are a fascinating type of Stellaroid. Every so often, they pick a new leader. By my calculations, it won't be long before we have a new Count of the Duloos.

I'm too old to climb the Monolith myself, but I'm hoping a Trekker with a spirit of discovery can record the whole election process for me.
Agent.200301.3:
We're recruiting new product testers! Just put on our latest sunglasses, take a walk through the brightest place you can find, and write up a short review.

Easy enough, right?
Agent.200302.3:
"My new proposal is due this week, but I don't have a shred of inspiration right now..."

"Can you help me gather some reference material on lighting? Anything at all!"

"Not that it matters much... Whatever I end up drawing, they'll just go with the first draft anyway."
Agent.200303.3:
Have you ever had to shut down a party early because of neighbor complaints?

Have you ever had to turn off the lights the moment the clock struck, just because Grace is too expensive?

Do you always feel like the days are too long and the nights too short?

Join us! Come and party with us till dawn!
Contact address: ███████████
Agent.300101.3:
Help the new Trekker recruits master their basic rhythm skills!

I'll give you these cartridges so you can give them some extra training!
Agent.300102.3:
I've heard you're pretty good at chasing high scores in rhythm games...

Why not show my students how it's done? I'll trade you these cartridges for the favor. A pretty good deal, right?
Agent.300103.3:
That's right! In the Monolith Game Room, there's one legendary rhythm game that shows up from time to time...

If you can challenge the "Boss's Tune," I can share a few treasures from my collection with you...
Agent.300201.3:
If they can't even hit a stationary target, there's no way they're ready for the field! Help me put them through some intensive training!

These cartridges are all yours, as promised!
Agent.300202.3:
I've heard you can clear even the toughest danmaku games on a single credit...

I'll leave the demo for this open class to you. Finish the job, and these cartridges are yours!
Agent.300203.3:
Clearing "Demon Bee" on a single credit is hailed as the ultimate milestone for any Trekker's training... Some even call it the next step in human evolution!

 If you can pull it off, these collectibles will be your reward...
Agent.300301.3:
The new generation of Trekkers' reflexes and focus aren't where they need to be... They're going to need some serious, disciplined training!

 If you're willing to help out, these cartridges will be your reward!
Agent.300302.3:
I've heard that in that fighting game, you've beaten everyone around without breaking a sweat...?

My students are itching for a challenge. Teach them a lesson for me, and you'll be handsomely rewarded!
Agent.300303.3:
You can withstand that lightning-fast fifteen-hit combo, too?! Amazzzzzzing... So you've heard of the legend of the game "The Phantom" as well...!

 Recreate that battle for me, and my collection will be your prize!
Agent.400101.3: I've heard there's a dance master inside the Monolith and I want to challenge him. Can someone show me the way?
Agent.400102.3:
Last time I only lost by a hair! This time I've brought my teacher, and we'll be unstoppable together!

 Can someone show us the way?
Agent.400103.3:
I've brought my teacher, my teacher's teacher, and even my teacher's teacher's teacher.

This time, we're definitely making the Grotesque Dancer taste defeat! Can someone lead us there one more time?
Agent.400201.3:
The Cursipots have been bullying Glopos a lot lately. I can't just stand by and watch.

I need a good partner to help me drive those steaming pots away, so our Glopos can finally have some peace.
Agent.400202.3:
I just broke the last pot... If my employer finds out, I'm definitely getting fired this time!

Please, I'm begging you—help me find a few sturdy pots. I' can offer this month's wages in return.
Agent.400203.3: Oh glorious and mighty Count of the Duloos! To be but a trembling thistle at the corner of your castle walls would be far greater than to stand as a towering oak elsewhere—why will you not allow me to prostrate myself before your throne and inscribe my name upon your iron register! I only wish for a glimpse of your noble visage!
Agent.400203.4: A Fanatic Admirer of the Count
Agent.400301.3: The light at home has been broken for days. Could you help me find a new bulb to replace it?
Agent.400302.3:
"The master said... The family's heirloom lamp ran away."

"That lamp has been the house's night watchman for over two hundred years, but now it's completely out of control."

"You must bring it back at any cost!"

"...Anyway, that's what the master said."
Agent.400303.3:
It's too bright, way too bright! It's keeping all of us from getting any sleep.

Someone, anyone, just go and turn that lamp off!
